  amy

Andrea Carr <ACARR3@...> wrote:
              Amy,
  
  I have seen spirits in my house but without any aid. They either zip around really fast so that I only catch a glimpse of them or I have seen them as orbs. I haven�t sued scrying to astral travel as I do it enough when I sleep-LOL!
  
  Now the mirror is very effective as a tool but you do have to be careful with it as you have to know how to not let certain elemental beings that might try to enter using your energy. Scrying is a very personal thing for many reasons.  It takes time & patience to focus. You need to be alone and have no disturbances around you. I prefer to do it at night with a candle flickering. I use a blackened in mirror but you can also do it with a bowl of water, a piece of dark glass or a darkened crystal ball. 
  
  Here is an excellent book that I recommend reading for it. I did and it�s a great guide: http://cgi.ebay.com/Scrying-for-Beginners-by-Donald-Tyson_W0QQitemZ270004310659QQihZ017QQcategoryZ378QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem
  
  Andrea
  
  -----Original Message-----
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Amy Swanson
Sent: Saturday, July 08, 2006 4:33 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Fwd: [Haunted_Times_Magazine_Public_group] Scrying/Pendulums: Worth Reading!
  
          so you can see the spirits in your HOUSE? elsewhere what? lol

    astral? travel?

    yah, ive NO clue

    thats my problem! LOL

    I am tryin to learn as much as i can, reading etc, but alot of it is very vague. Talking about techniques etc, but NOT WHY do it or WHY NOT do it. For all these subjects i am interested in. How to start, whats effective , what to be careful of etc etc etc.

    I am just looking for other ways of communication. Medium, is what i am interested in, i think that i was given this tool at a young age but have never used it, and tuned it out.

    

    amy
